column1: Common Bond Bistro & Bakery - Montrose////While visiting Houston
column2: I made it a point to come to this place (the friend I stayed with also told me it was a must in H-town). I think that the concept behind Common Bond is enough to get me to come
column3: and showing up on a Sunday afternoon
column4: only to find out all of the brunch items had sold out
column5: is a good indication of the level of popularity.
